text: Thirteen first ladies of the United States have written a total of 22 memoirs. Every memoir by a first lady published in the 20th and 21st centuries has been a bestseller, at times outselling those of their presidential husbands.. == Memoirs == Title First lady Publisher Year Identifier Putnam Publishing Group 1975 Recollections of Full Years Dodd, Mead & Company 1914 My Memoir Bobbs- Merrill Company 1939 This is My Story Harper & Brothers 1937 This I Remember Harper & Brothers 1949 On My Own: The Years since the White House Harper & Brothers 1958 Harper & Brothers 1961 Holt, Rinehart & Winston 1970 Harper & Row 1978 Betty: A Glad Awakening Doubleday 1987 First Lady from Plains Houghton Mifflin 1984 Everything to Gain: Making the Most of the Rest of Your Life Random House 1987 Nancy: The Autobiography of America's First Lady HarperCollins 1980 My Turn: The Memoirs of Nancy Reagan Random House 1989 Barbara Bush: A Memoir Scribner 1994 Reflections: Life After the White House Scribner 2004 Living History Simon & Schuster 2003 Hard Choices Simon & Schuster 2014 What Happened Simon & Schuster 2017 Spoken from the Heart Scribner 2010 Becoming Michelle Obama Crown Publishing Group 2018 Where the Light Enters: Building a Family, Discovering Myself Flatiron Books 2019 == References == Category:Books Category:First Ladies of the United States
